purpose: Curated, small reviewer-seed artifacts used by scripts/reproduce_reviewer_seed.py (no large external downloads required).

papers.note: MNRAS letter source (compiled PDFs are not tracked in git by design).

reviewer_seed_inputs.description: Cumulative W1max scan using Poisson GLM (ecliptic-latitude nuisance), including fitted dipoles per cut.
Clustered lognormal mocks covariance summary at W1max=16.6 (n=500).
Correlated-cut drift Monte Carlo null summary (Poisson-only correlated scan).
unWISE time-domain epoch-sliced dipole amplitude summary (2010-2020 epochs).
